name: solr-js2
description: A lightweight, JavaScript engine for building Solr requests

scripts.pretest: rm -f solr-js2.* && export VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && sed -E -e s/{{VERSION}}/$VERSION/ src/Core.js | smash src/Core.js | uglifyjs -b indent-level=2 -o solr-js2.js
scripts.widgets: smash widgets/*.js | uglifyjs -b indent-level=2 -o solr-js2.widgets.js && uglifyjs -nc -mt < solr-js2.widgets.js > solr-js2.widgets.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run-script widgets && chmod a-w solr-js2.*.js && zip solr-js2.zip LICENSE solr-js2.*.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
